settings.description: My product knowledge story is much wider and much deeper than meets the eye. I began learning the cut and sew industry back in 1998, in New Orleans, as part of a larger family business. I took the initiative to learn the business from the ground up, from pattern making and sewing, to sourcing and shipping. I worked in every department but it was the creative hands on process that became my passion.

settings.text: Since then, I've designed and manufactured products for some of the largest companies in the pet industry, started and sold companies of my own and gained incredible insight into how business and marketing work. So now, I've decided to use that knowledge and focus on my passion, Black Lab Brands... a line of elevated essentials with amazing versatility and timeless style for you and your pup.
